resources.string: Just Drive knows if you\'re in a vehicle or not while maintaining low battery consumption and taking care of all incoming phone calls and text messages. It also display an app lock to selected applications to minimize usage of device will driving. The app lock will be deactivated automatically and/or through an on-screen test to prove that you are not driving.
This app won\'t run unless you update Google Play services.
No text, tweet, Facebook update, or email is worth your life so put the phone down and Just Drive.\n\nJust Drive lock this app for your own safety, It will be enabled later after you drive.
ACCESSIBILITY SETTINGS is needed on Lollipop.
Are you driving? For your own safety, Just Drive locked selected applications while taking care of all incoming calls and text messages while you are driving.
For your own safety, Just Drive locked selected applications.
Navigation Drawer used to switch between major features of the application
